about_the_game:
Use this official walkthrough to find every ending, achievement, and hidden ending.

These 70+ pages guide you through most conversations, with the best responses, to help build trust with your teammates. Highlights places where your decisions will impact future endings or achievements.

Note: Best to use this after at least one playthrough yourself. This guide contains complete spoilers of the story.

***

HOW TO ACCESS DLC FILES
DLC files found with in the game installation path
Once downloaded, you'll find this in the DLC of Fresh Force Frustrations in your Steam Library. Right-click the name of the game, click on Properties, then go to the Local Files tab, then click Browse Local Files. You'll find the DLC there.

Example file path: C:\Program Files (x86)\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\TheComingEndFreshForce

content_descriptors.notes:
Includes screenshots and sprites from the game featuring naked men, men engaging in anal and oral sex, bondage, domination, and some non-consensual bondage and sex (also without story context).

Includes tentacles and anthro and furry characters.
